::Zenyak/Striker/Prowl::

Zenyak lands with a grunt against a tree. He gets up, ignoring his internal 
computer, which was saying, "Warning. Logic center ... offline. Severe system 
damage."

The predacon laughs like a maniak, looking at the giant beast that was Iron 
Raptor and the maximal floating above her, who was Striker.

"Ha!" The now-crazy predacon yells, "YOU CAN'T KILL ME!!! I AM INVINCIBLE!" 
With that he takes out a pistol, aiming it quickly at the maximals in front 
of him. The arm thats holding the pistol snaps off due to the bite Iron 
Raptor, which had severely damaged it.

He looks in surprise at the stump of his arm, then looks back up at the 
maximals. "No matter!" he yells, "I will destroy you all!"

With his functional arm, Zenyak takes out another grenade, laughing madly and 
throwing it at the maximals. At that point his self-destruct countdown 
reaches zero and he starts igniting.

A blue and red blur flies in from the direction of the Ark, grabbing the 
grenade in midair and throwing it into a clump of trees to harmlessly burn 
down a sizable portion of the forest, possibly taking quite a few animals 
with it.

Striker looks in disgust as Zenyak detonates, screaming like an idiot. Pieces 
of the once-sane predacon fall everywhere.

Prowl lands near Striker and Iron Raptor, grinning. "I thought you guys might 
need some help," he says, raising his voice slightly so he could be heard 
above the two explosions.

Prowl then turns serious as he sees Iron Raptor's torn up side, "Are you all 
right?"
